# Welcome {.unnumbered}

<img src="./PDSR_cover_2022_4x3.jpg" alt="ProgDatSciR" style="width:100%;filter: drop-shadow(0 0 .3rem #333);"/>
<br><br>
Welcome to PDSR!
<br><br>
This book is aimed as an introductory- to intermediate-level  
programming learning resource for R.

It is the online reference for UCSF Biostat 
[213](https://epibiostat.ucsf.edu/programming-health-data-science-r-biostat-213) & 
[214](https://epibiostat.ucsf.edu/programming-health-data-science-r-ii-biostat-214).
